label: AcknowledgementDocument
comment: A document exchanged between parties for a business application level acknowledgement of the receipt of information.

datatypeProperties.comment: Reason information, expressed as text, for this acknowledgement document.
A code specifying a status for this acknowledgement document.
A code specifying an acknowledgment status for this acknowledgement document.
The code specifying the channel by which this acknowledgement document is sent, such as mail, email, fax.
The indication of whether or not a control is required for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
The creation date, time, date time, or other date time value for this payment trade settlement.
A code specifying a type of acknowledgement document.
An issue date, time, date time or other date time value for this declared error.
The unique identifier of an item in this acknowledgement document.
The indication of whether or not this acknowledgement document has multiple references.
A process condition, expressed as text, for this acknowledgement document.
The code specifying the process condition for this acknowledgement document.
A document referenced by this acknowledgement document.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the receipt of the report being acknowledged by this acknowledgment document.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the submission of the report being acknowledged by this acknowledgment document.

referencedBy.comment: The acknowledgement document referenced in this document line.
